content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide any opinion, but QuickBooks is a popular choice for many small businesses. It can help you manage your cash flow with its cash flow dashboard, invoicing features, and forecasting tools. QuickBooks also integrates with many other tools and services, such as banks, payroll, and payment processing tools. Overall, QuickBooks could be a great option for small businesses that need easy-to-use accounting software to track their cash flow. It's also available in different versions, so you can choose the one that suits your needs and budget.
